Nevedium, the Armor of Demonblood: Athanasia, the Armor of the Reaper

description: Ring of Divine winds is mainly there for the fun aspect of it, its not really preferred above the rest.
Brave Heart and Wings of Immortal is used for defense.
Use Crown of Serenity if no one else has it on the team.
Cosmic Star is situational - Targetted healing vs aoe healing
Crown of Absolute Zero is used for damage while Hood of Apocalypse is support
Can use Crown of Serenity if no one else has it on the team
Use Jupiter if you are INT, Nevedium as AGI. Harmony is another support option
Use Horn of God and Nebula Rose interchangably as INT and Ring of the One as AGI for damage
Archangel Wings are an AGI yolo build...
Use Crown for DPS, prophetia for burst
Prophetia may also be good for DPS if it provides good rng resets on T
Use alternate build for more safety (much more expensive. Less damage, but it's much easier to play)

Vest of Divine Winds: Athanasia, the Armor of the Reaper

description: Use Halo for AMS when needed
Only make Cape of Deep Abyss if no one else on your team has it or Ring of Despair (however, always build Cloak of the Fallen Shadows)
Use Wings of Blood Lord for pre-tower bosses and Death Fiend as its useful in those situations
Using Wings of Flame Lord is a MUST when using Astra
Build Lightning god until eye of the reaper
Vest of Storm is good until Athanasia
Vest of Storm is good until Nevedium
Use Visage if the run is lacking supports and you need AMS
Use Exitium if you think you need to save yourself
Use Ruler if there is already a Ring of Despair or another Deep Abyss in the team
This build is a spell caster build with items that give crit since Trickster's Q and T have crit.
The alt items are support items, since they can be used twice.
Attack speed is important for Alchemist, especially early game when you don't have Ring of Divine winds yet
Use this weapon progression to counter the lack of attack speed: Staff of Contagion → Staff of Domination → Staff of Plague
Use Ender with Zombie Lord Icon for a better weapon
Archangel wings and Crimson Hatred are "bridge" items before reach agareth and should not be main items
Accessory progression: Mana Heart Frost → Seal of Deceiver → Latea, the Ring of Overlord → Ring of the One
If you don't have enough supports and would like a safer option, use RoTo
use Grim Heart before WOFL/SD
Use Apocalypse for survival if needed, it comes with some support as well
Use Cold Ring of Death is someone else on your team has Horn of God for DPS
Use Winter Robe for survival if needed
Brave Heart is a defensive option if needed

Eye of the Flame Lord: Prophetia, the Greater Source of Mana

description: Use Apocalypse for survival if needed, it comes with some support as well
Use Winter Robe for survival if needed
Brave Heart is a defensive option if needed

Eye of the Flame Lord: Prophetia, the Greater Source of Mana

description: Use Soul Devourer for a hybrid of sustain and DPS
Crown of Cleansing may be a good combo when used with Jupiter
Secondary items are better used in case main ones are used by another ally
Use Wings of Immortal if no other reviver
If you have enough healing use Armageddon to enhance team burst
Eye of the Flame Lord really should be on priest, but if there are no priests, then its good to have one
Both Druid and Jupiter are great, but each shine in different areas
Jupiter: Great for non-targetted AoE healing/stun, has a long CD
Druid: Great for precise, single-target heals (esp snipers), harder to use
Use Protection of the Fairies as support wings
Before getting Nebula Rose, can use Ring of Composure or stick to Eternal Rose if you get it first
Can use Hood of Apocrypha before getting Crown of Composure since that requires Shadow Dragon
Swap between Ring of Hope and Bell of Light for different situations
Use Grim Heart until Protection of the Fairies, then make Wings of Immortal
Protection of the Fairies will help farming the tower/aga
With the attack speed from Heartrender you can swap rings to fit the team's needs (Recommend Heart of LIfe)
I would recommend using survival wings more than dps as you are made of paper ~ Zany
Use Sanguis if there is someone else using Frost Herald and Jupiter
Once Fruit of Origin is released use that as the main ring (If it ever comes copium) ~ Zany
